title: GREAT LOCATION! AMAZING APARTMENT UNITS!
posting_body: CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants- BRE #01449928
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 734 Sq.
Surround yourself with resort-style landscaping and the finest amenities to help you escape from the hectic pace of everyday life.
Our professional management staff goes the extra step to provide you with most comfortable living experience.
Plus, Chaparral's prime location puts you minutes from the freeway, restaurants and the Antelope Valley Mall.
Come to the best address in town!
Studios $1,000 OAC, One Bed $1,200 OAC, Two Bed $1,500 OAC.

Large Bedrooms, Extended closets, Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets 25Lbs or less), Air Conditioning, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Window Covering, Built-In Microwave, Central Air, View, Ceiling Fans, Fireplace, Private Balconies/Patios
Laundry Facility, Small Dogs Allowed, Easy Freeway Access, Covered Parking, Cats Allowed, Tennis Court, Public Transportation, Swimming Pool, Business Center
Pets Allowed: Small Dogs and Cats
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
